item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
Welcome to my blog for posting my thoughts, projects and learnings about software development, systems design, embedded devices, technologies and industry trends. I’m generating this blog using HUGO on Github Pages out of a git repository.

I think my first post will be about setting this blog. Watch for it!
